div.p: General scheme of the terpene synthesis pathways in plants and their inhibitors. ABA: abscisic acid. CLO: clomazone. DMAPP: isomer dimethylallyl diphosphte. DXP: 1-deoxy- d-xylulose 5-phosphate. DXR: DXP reductoisomerase. DXS: DXP synthase. FPP: farnesyl diphosphate. FSM: fosmidomycin. GGPP: geranylgeranyl diphosphate. G3P: d-glyceraldehyde-3 phosphate. HMG-CoA: 3-hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl-coenzyme A. HMGR: HMG-CoA reductase. IPP: isopentenyl diphosphate. MEP: methyl- d-erytritol-4-phosphate. MEV: mevinoline. MVA: mevalonate [ 10, 11]
